physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a Burmese Funeral procession. The photograph shows a huge crowd accompanying the procession. In the center of the photograph
 there is a funeral car and spire. There are several other carts in the background. The carts all have white flags on them. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.
